alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 2:10PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Goshen County through 245 PM MDT... At 210 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawk Springs Recreation Area, or 27 miles south of Torrington, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hawk Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
